introduction: Here are a few of my hobbies and interests.

paragraphs.text: My primary hobby outside of academic interests is poker. I've mostly played Texas No-Limit cash games at $5/10 stakes, where I've been a strong, winning player. Recently, I transitioned into tournaments. I paid my last semester's tuition entirely with my poker earnings. In addition to poker, I enjoy improving my typing speed. Most of my recent typing tests are done on monkeytype.com, where I average ~160 words per minute. I also very recently started playing chess at the beginning of 2024. I play on lichess.org where I have a rating of 1600+ in bullet and blitz.
I love being active and playing sports. I enjoy both playing and watching sports, mostly soccer, basketball, and UFC. I play on the club soccer team at Duke University.
